question: Can LB-100 sensitize ovarian carcinoma to cisplatin?
ideal_answer: Yes, LB100 sensitizes ovarian carcinoma cells to cisplatin-mediated cytotoxicity.

snippets.text: The protein phosphatase 2A inhibitor LB100 sensitizes ovarian carcinoma cells to cisplatin-mediated cytotoxicity.
LB100 sensitized ovarian carcinoma lines to cisplatin-mediated cell death.
Our results suggest that LB100 sensitizes ovarian cancer cells to cisplatin in vitro and in vivo by modulation of the DDR pathway and cell-cycle checkpoint abrogation.
